Html: I'm trying to extend TreeViewEx to have similar functionality to what's described in http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/28306/Working-with-Checkboxes-in-the-WPF-TreeView, while following the MVVM pattern of the BindingSample. This may just be my lack of experience with WPF, but it's being much more difficult than I expected. Has anyone had success with this that they can share? Thanks, Eric
